pageContext.claim: “And by the way, the inspector general, he went by the whistleblower. He didn't want to see the conversation that I had. When he saw the conversation that I had, he said, 'Well, that bears no resemblance to what the whistleblower said.' Why didn't he look first before he ran to Congress? He ran to Congress like he couldn't get there fast enough with a whistleblower report.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a fantasy. The IG for the intelligence community did not say this when he read a transcript of Trump's phone conversation. That's because the whistleblower report is correct on key details about the call between Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, according to the rough transcript released by the White House. Other details contained in the whistleblower complaint have been largely confirmed, according to a line-by-line examination by The Fact Checker.
